EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You for Choosing QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
I am pleased to tell you about QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions Advanced Inventory (1) to help you efficiently manage inventory across your business. Learn more at http://enterprisesuite.intuit.com/products/advanced-inventory/.
When you add Advanced Inventory, you’ll get these sophisticated inventory capabilities right in QuickBooks with the same user interface—there’s no need for separate software or data integration:
NEW! Bin Location Tracking Track specific inventory items down to the bin location level within one or more warehouses. When filling out forms, automatically see quantities and serial or lot numbers for each bin. Sort pick lists and item receipts by location for efficient picking and stocking.
NEW! Barcode Scanning Increase efficiency and reliability for all inventory data entry by scanning items and serial numbers without touching a keyboard — QuickBooks automatically puts the information into the right field. If you don't have barcodes, QuickBooks will create them for you. Integrates with any simple USB barcode scanner. (2)
Track Serial Numbers or Lot Numbers Enter serial numbers and lots at the time of purchase, transfer, or sale for more reliable tracking. Plus, track defective lots through assemblies and subassemblies, in stock on shelves, and customer purchases with new reports.
Use FIFO Inventory Costing Get the flexibility to track inventory using FIFO costing or average costing, and switch between the two methods at any time. (3)
Know the value and quantity of inventory in multiple locations For each location, you can see how many items are on hand, on sales order, on purchase order, and your reorder point.
If you have questions about what Advanced Inventory can do for you, I can help. Just call me Mon-Fri, 5:30 am-5:30 pm PST.
Regards,
(1) Additional fees apply for the Advanced Inventory add-on subscription. Requires QuickBooks Enterprise Solutions 13.0 with an active Full Service Plan and an Internet connection.
(2) Barcode scanner sold separately.
(3) If the Advanced Inventory add-on subscription lapses, users' data will revert to average cost for all dates.
Note: Terms, conditions, pricing, special offers, features, and service options subject to change without notice.
